Articles.Content: <figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"><img data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480" alt="image" src="http://40.media.tumblr.com/ab8ca95fa6c767a94ca66db2600759c6/tumblr_inline_nt8oktkRIi1rr2wit_540.jpg"/></figure><figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="286" data-orig-width="474"><img data-orig-height="286" data-orig-width="474" alt="image" src="http://38.media.tumblr.com/7f3dc8facbe29a6925e4bb6aa3108ae3/tumblr_inline_nt8p1poHTs1rr2wit_500.gif"/></figure><p>The WasdEditorCamera mod brings new camera controls to your Vehicle Assembly Building and SpacePlane Hangar!</p><p>This add-on will allow you to use the WASD keys to fly into cargo bays and other parts so you can get the camera angle you need to place your parts with minute precision. More information and the download link can be found in the <b><a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122297">forum thread</a></b>.</p>

I'm really glad this mod got a spotlight. It's absolutely essential for when your vision gets obscured and is a tool everyone should have.

Edit: Additional camera tool - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94171-1-0-Camera-Tools-v1-3-%28compatibility-fixes%29-May-16

I actually thought it was this one when I posted LOL! Still, WASD tools is excellent for what it does.

Edited August 17, 2015 by OddFunction
This is a really useful mod, I'm gonna add this one to my default mods list!
This is really cool! You could be the kerbal walking around in the SPH!
